Title: Hair of the Spider
Description:
Light good, but more to do. 

Spiders came from everywhere. Nebb quick, Nebb heard them. But friend Snubjaw... he bit. Sick now.

Nebb might know a way, yes, turn venom into cure. Use bite to cure bite.

Bring venom. Hurry now!
RewardText: Yes, nasty venom make perfect cure.
